article_title: Farmacy Garden offers education, nutrition to needy families
article_text:

og.description: CHRISTIANSBURG — New River Valley Community Health Center nurse practitioner Raschid Ghoorahoo often writes his patients prescriptions, but these days they’re not always for pills. Sometimes, they’re for produce.
